Params: {1: '1', 2: 'Watanabe', 3: "You'll be able to rappel down the wall to the desert after we take down this wave of guards.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'We have an agreement with the Purifying Force.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken B', 3: "That's right, sir! They've taken so many of us in the past!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Forsaken B', 3: 'If you go back on this, they might not help us later.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Watanabe', 3: 'When the Forsaken make a promise, we keep it.', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Forsaken B', 3: 'Please, sir... at least take a few elite members with you, just to be safe.', 4: '2'}
